heading: This Afternoon
temperature: Mid to upper 50s south, upper 40s to mid 50s north

heading: Tonight
text: Showers likley early, maybe mixing with snow late in the far north.

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of a rain or snow shower north, except snow showers likely in the St. Lawrence Valley. Blustery.

heading: Friday
text: Snow showers likely north, scattered south.
temperature: Upper 20s to upper 30s, north to south
